buyers.title: Buyers
buyers.description: The entities whose budgets will be used to purchase the goods, services or works specified in this particular award. When the multiple buyer extension is used, a buyer must be specified here **unless** the buyer for this award is the same as the overall buyer specified at the release level.

buyer.title: Buyer
buyer.description: The entity whose budget will be used to purchase the goods or services specified in this particular contract. When the multiple buyer extension is used, a buyer must be specified here **unless** the buyer for this contract is the same as the overall buyer specified at the release level.
